title: US stocks mixed hours before opening bell, Meta Platforms to release 4th quarter earning
text: U.S. stocks were mixed early Wednesday morning hours before the opening bell on Wall Street, with both the tech-heavy Nasdaq and S&P indexes higher, but the Dow slightly below the previous days close.

title: Facebook and Google should pay compensation to people scammed on their sites, say MPs
text: Online giants such as Facebook, Google and Twitter should be forced to pay compensation to people duped by scammers operating on their sites, MPs have suggested.

title: Facebook's dream of creating its own global cryptocurrency officially comes to an end
text: In June 2019, after years of being under scrutiny for the impact its platforms have on society, Facebook unveiled one of its most ambitious projects yet: a cryptocurrency called Libra, which would be backed by an international consortium of companies. The effort had such lofty goals as providing financial services to the underbanked and extending the social media company's mission of connecting the world into the burgeoning market for digital money.

title: Meta Reportedly in Talks to Buy Audio Software Startup for Content Creators
text: Facebook's parent company Meta Platforms is reportedly closer to sealing an acquisition deal for the Greek audio software startup Accusonus, which specializes in easy-to-use tools for content creators, musicians and more, Kathimerini reported on Tuesday (Feb. 1). Under the rumored deal, Meta will acquire 100% of Accusonus from its founders and shareholders, according to Kathimerini.

title: Will Global User Growth Aid Meta Platfoms (FB) Q4 Earnings?
text: Meta Platforms' (FB) fourth-quarter 2021 performance is likely to reflect a burgeoning international user base and investments on promoting e-commerce.

title: My Top 5 Investments For 2022 - January In Review
text: We're starting with reviewing our top 5 investments for 2022, along with their performance in January. Palantir has performed the worst, however, overall, the basket of stocks has outperformed the S&P 500.

title: Earnings Outlook: Can Facebook show it deserves the name Meta?
text: Facebook wants to be called “Meta,” but its earnings will show the business is almost entirely Facebook.

title: Facebook Stock Is a Gem Investors Need to Accumulate on Dips
text: FB stock metrics are bulletproof. So, by investors should be looking for entry spots on dips, especially from bad earnings reactions.

text: Which of these tech stocks can benefit from the growth of the metaverse?

title: Facebook Parent Meta (FB) Attempting to Break Out
text: Ahead of earnings, option traders appear to be positioning themselves for the Meta share price to continue its wider downward trend.

title: Earnings Previews: Meta Platforms, Qualcomm, Spotify, T-Mobile
text: U.S. equity markets opened mixed on Tuesday. By mid-morning, the Dow Jones industrials still clung to a fractional gain, while the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq continued sinking.

title: Stock Market News for Feb 1, 2022
text: Wall Street closed sharply higher on Monday to end a topsy-turvy January.

title: Facebook (Meta) Earnings: What to Look For
text: Facebook (META) (FB) reports Q4 earnings after market close on Feb. 2. Can the company reverse slowing growth in its revenue and monthly active users?
